name: search_country
description: Return data of the country determined by query.

query.description: The name or IATA code of the country.

key.description: Determine whether query is a name (default) or an IATA code. It must be either "name" or "code".

name: search_location
description: Return data of the city determined by its name.

name: list_amenities
description: List the names of all the amenities.

name: search_amenity
description: Return data of the amenity determined by its name.

name: list_hotels
description: List the hotels in the given location.

page.description: A page number. 0 (default) is the first page.

page_size.description: Number of hotels in a page. Default: 5.

name: list_room_types
description: The request returns a list of rooms type.

name: list_hotel_types
description: The request returns a list of hotels type.

name: hotel_photos
description: The request returns photo ids of the given hotel(s).

id.description: One or more id of the hotels (from list_hotels) indicated through a comma.

name: city_photo
description: Return the url of a photo of the given city.

photo_size.description: Size of the photo (width, height). Default: (960, 720).

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
